#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
  int t,found;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{int n;
scanf("%d",&n);
 for(int i=n;i>=1;i--)
{ int p=i;
   found=0;
while(p!=0)
  {
        if(p%10!=1&&p%10!=3)
          { found=1;
        break;
          }
p/=10;

  }
  if(found==0)
  {
   cout<<i<<endl;
break;
}



}
}


}
